meta.description: Optimize the use of two radiation beams to minimize the total radiation received by the pancreas while meeting constraints on skin and tumor radiation.

params.name: dose_pancreas
params.description: Dose delivered to the pancreas per minute by each beam.

params.name: dose_skin
params.description: Dose delivered to the skin per minute by each beam.

params.name: dose_tumor
params.description: Dose delivered to the tumor per minute by each beam.

objective.name: min_total_pancreas_dose
objective.description: Minimize the total dose received by the pancreas.

constraints.name: skin_dose_limit
constraints.description: Total dose to the skin should not exceed 4 units.

constraints.name: tumor_dose_requirement
constraints.description: Total dose to the tumor should be at least 3 units.
